content: ...should it be always set to completed? (It is required by IPS, having it with a different value does not make much sense?)

Michele Mottini said:

...should it be always set to completed? (It is required by IPS, having it with a different value does not make much sense?)

(FHIR) IPS doesn't constraint this to "completed". ... In general it might be relevant to be able to say not given for this reason...
I get that for IPS, but I assume that vaccinations not given would not end up in a vaccine certificate?
